page.title: 10 RELIGION
page.content: The Reverend Ian Gardner is the Vicar of 4 parishes, Vernham Dean. Faccombe, Linkenholt and Hurstbourne Tarrent. His Vicarage is in Hurstbourne Tarrent so there is no resident clergyman in Vernham Dean. Services are held every Sunday in our church but not always by the vicar. Sometimes a lay member of the church takes a service but only an ordained priest can take Holy communion. The Vicar is also a govenor of the school,as it is a church school. He takes all services of baptism, marriages and funerals. The Church of St. Mary at Vernham Dean has a Norman Porch also part of the North wall but was extensively altered in the nineteenth century.
